summary: This is an email correspondence dated August 12, 2019, regarding an update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation status at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It appears to be a communication from a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the suicide watch and psychological observation update at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: Suicide Watch/Psych Observation Update
events.description: An update on Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation status was issued.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: On August 12, 2019, an update was issued regarding Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch and psychological observation.
The update originated from a forensic psychologist with the U.S. Public Health Service.
Epstein was incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York at the time.
